## VisibleTileSet.getTile() method

Gets the tile corresponding to the given data source, key and offset, creating it if necessary.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTile(dataSource: DataSource, tileKey: TileKey, offset?: number): Tile | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataSource | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md) | The data source the tile belongs to. |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The key identifying the tile. |
|  offset | number | Tile offset.  The tile if it was found or created, undefined otherwise. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) \| undefined
